Author: Subhro Majumder
Summary: Using this script, you can capture details of multiple Azure VMs and generate CSV report. Information includes VM Name,Size,Location, AVl Set, OS & Data Disk details, Networking details etc. You can run this script against a Subscription / Resource Group or a single VM.
Title: Capture Azure VM Details
UserTags: Azure VM Details, Get Azure VM Details, Capture Azure VM Details
